tags: spider man into the spider verse
summary: spider-verse facts and headcanons to give you some feels
title: spider-verse facts and headcanons to give you some feels
body:
Spoilers under the cut. Some of these are facts once you analyze the film but there’s some headcanons in here too because why not.

- Miles’s ran back to his parents and not his dorm room after seeing blonde Peter die because he wanted his parents’ comfort after seeing something that traumatic.

- Peni cried when her robot was destroyed not just because her best friend, the spider’s, home was destroyed but also because that robot was made by her father. That robot was a reminder of her father and watching the robot get wrecked, she was reminded of his death.

- MJ from Miles’s world is pregnant with blonde Peter’s child and was waiting for him to come home from fighting kingpin to tell him. 

- Blonde Peter was eager to teach Miles the ropes because he and MJ have been trying to have kids and he wanted to be a father badly. 

- The reason Noir like egg creams is because his uncle Benjamin used to buy them for him whenever he was down as a kid.

- MJ is Gwen’s world has been trying to connect with her but Gwen keeps trying to keep their relationship “professional” and only as band members. Hopefully that changes after he adventures with the other spiders.

- In older Peter’s universe, he’s going to have a son with MJ and his name will be Benjamin Miles Parker.
body_abstract: Spoilers under the cut. Some of these are facts once you analyze the film but there’s some headcanons in here too because why not.

- In older Peter’s universe, he’s going to have a son with MJ and his name will be Benjamin Miles Parker.

Spoilers under the cut. Some of these are facts once you analyze the film but there’s some headcanons in here too because why not.

[[MORE]]

- Miles’s ran back to his parents and not his dorm room after seeing blonde Peter die because he wanted his parents’ comfort after seeing something that traumatic.

- Peni cried when her robot was destroyed not just because her best friend, the spider’s, home was destroyed but also because that robot was made by her father. That robot was a reminder of her father and watching the robot get wrecked, she was reminded of his death.

- MJ from Miles’s world is pregnant with blonde Peter’s child and was waiting for him to come home from fighting kingpin to tell him. 

- Blonde Peter was eager to teach Miles the ropes because he and MJ have been trying to have kids and he wanted to be a father badly. 

- The reason Noir like egg creams is because his uncle Benjamin used to buy them for him whenever he was down as a kid.

- MJ is Gwen’s world has been trying to connect with her but Gwen keeps trying to keep their relationship “professional” and only as band members. Hopefully that changes after he adventures with the other spiders.

- In older Peter’s universe, he’s going to have a son with MJ and his name will be Benjamin Miles Parker.
trail.content:
Spoilers under the cut. Some of these are facts once you analyze the film but there’s some headcanons in here too because why not.

- Miles’s ran back to his parents and not his dorm room after seeing blonde Peter die because he wanted his parents’ comfort after seeing something that traumatic.

- Peni cried when her robot was destroyed not just because her best friend, the spider’s, home was destroyed but also because that robot was made by her father. That robot was a reminder of her father and watching the robot get wrecked, she was reminded of his death.

- MJ from Miles’s world is pregnant with blonde Peter’s child and was waiting for him to come home from fighting kingpin to tell him. 

- Blonde Peter was eager to teach Miles the ropes because he and MJ have been trying to have kids and he wanted to be a father badly. 

- The reason Noir like egg creams is because his uncle Benjamin used to buy them for him whenever he was down as a kid.

- MJ is Gwen’s world has been trying to connect with her but Gwen keeps trying to keep their relationship “professional” and only as band members. Hopefully that changes after he adventures with the other spiders.

- In older Peter’s universe, he’s going to have a son with MJ and his name will be Benjamin Miles Parker.
trail.content_abstract: Spoilers under the cut. Some of these are facts once you analyze the film but there’s some headcanons in here too because why not.

body:
I WATCHED SPIDERVERSE TODAY

I loved it!! i think its the best spiderman movie they’ve ever made!! also i started crying 20 minutes in and didnt stop until the credits… im a mess!! (but its ok because i was there with a very pretty girl and she cuddled me so i felt better)

blog.name: beats3161
blog.title: Beats Nas
blog.description: Fan Author of Spider-Man: Darkness, Transformers: (working on sub-title), Lego Bionicle: Shattered Dimension, and an original piece of work: Tales of Energy City.

body:
Spider-Man: Darkness is…

It is a third person point of view fan-made “dark and grounded” story of Spider-man that set in New York City in a Fallout’s Pre-War like setting. We will follow many different characters like Peter Parker, Venom, Mary Jane Watson, and Felicia Hardy.

There will be three big Acts and 3 smaller acts in each big Act.They will lead up to 3 different endings that you can choose.

I’m choosing and changing some characters’ races, age, sexual orientation, and genders to be diverse. No, It isn’t a SJW thing or a PC thing. It is a “oh shit, i don’t have any of this race and few of this gender character” decision. For example: Felicia will be in high school with Peter. She will be one of my white Asian American characters. Why am I doing that? In Marvel’s Spider Man game, she looks like asain to me. For Mary Jane, She will be pansexual/ lesbian due to the abuse that she got from her father. Two characters will have the biggest redesigns are Scorpion and Electro. Scorpion will be a female Africian American with poison powers before she becomes Scorpion. Electro will be female with paranoia. Why? I love what they did for Electro in Amazing Spider-Man 2.


Ask me anything if you want.


Beats Nas, 31-61 Beats.
